charges.charge_disposition: Term of imprisonment: Twenty-four (24) months as to Count One (1) and Thirty-six (36) months as to Count Three (3), to be served consecutively to each other, for a total term of sixty (60) months. SRT of four (4) years as to each count, to be served concurrently with each other. No fine. SMA of $100 per count, for a total of $200.00. Forfeiture in the amount of $4,000.00.
